name: Wild West Survival
description:
Wild West Survival is an open world survival game with a huge world. Survive the wild west by crafting, hunting, farming, fishing, building, and raiding. When survival is feasible, prosper the wild west by building towns throughout the maps.

ENVIRONMENT

• Huge Open World • Multiple Biomes • Swimmable Areas • Full Day / Night Cycle

BASE BUILDING

• Modular Build Parts • Furniture • Non-modular Building Units

FARMING

• Crops • Livestock

CHARACTER SELECTION

• Cowboy • Cowgirl

NPC

• Civilians • Sheriffs • Bandits • Hired Guns • Wildlife

SURVIVAL

• Hunger and Thirst System • Harvestable Items • Hunting • Farming • Loots

COMBAT

• Archery • Melee • Range

CRAFTABLES

• Tools • Weapons • Workbences

TRANSPORTATION

• Horse Riding System • Train

MARKET

• Buy from Vendors • Sell to Vendors • Hired Guns

WEARABLES

• Shirts • Pants • Shoes • Hats • Wigs
